survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from library users about their satisfaction with various services offered by the public library, including book availability, digital resources, and staff assistance.

questions.question_text: How often do you visit the public library in a typical month?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clear data collection.

script.question_text: How often do you visit the public library in a typical month?

questions.question_text: Which of the following library services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-selection to allow users to select all applicable options.

script.question_text: Which of the following library services have you used in the past 6 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of books and other materials at the library?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale with single-choice options for satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of books and other materials at the library?

questions.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would like to see in the library's services or facilities.
questions.client_notes: Allow open-ended responses to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please describe any improvements you would like to see in the library's services or facilities.
